entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
